director.name: 丹妮尔·哈丽丝 Danielle Harris

introduction: In the wake of her films Prank and Among Friends, horror icon Danielle Harris will be returning to the director’s chair with the upcoming Sequel, being billed as an all-female slasher.The “darkly comedic” horror movie comes from Joe Dante’s production company, Renfield Productions. “Though plot details remain under wraps, the title suggests a satirical shredding of the horror industry’s “final girl” trope,” the official press release sent out today teases.
